fields.description: Checking this will create new Patients with a Disabled status by default and will only be enabled after invoicing the Registration Fee.
fields.label: Collect Fee for Patient Registration

fields.description: Time period (Valid number of days) for free consultations
fields.label: Valid Number of Days

fields.description: You can configure default Items for billing consultation charges, procedure consumption items and inpatient visits
fields.label: Default Healthcare Service Items

fields.description: Default income accounts to be used if not set in Healthcare Practitioner to book Appointment charges.
fields.label: Income Account

fields.description: Default receivable accounts to be used to book Appointment charges.
fields.label: Receivable Account

fields.description: Check this if you want the Name and Designation of the Employee associated with the User who submits the document to be printed in the Lab Test Report.
fields.label: Employee name and designation in print

fields.default:
Hello {{doc.patient}}, Your {{doc.lab_test_name}} result is ready with {{doc.company }}. 
Thank You, Good day!
fields.label: Result Printed Message

fields.default:
Hello {{doc.patient}}, Your {{doc.lab_test_name}} result has been emailed to {{doc.email}}. 
{{doc.company }}. 
Thank You, Good day!
fields.label: Result Emailed Message

fields.description: Checking this will restrict printing and emailing of Lab Test documents unless they have the status as Approved.
fields.label: Do not print or email Lab Tests without Approval

fields.description:
If checked, a customer will be created, mapped to Patient.
Patient Invoices will be created against this Customer. You can also select existing Customer while creating Patient.
fields.label: Link Customer to Patient

fields.description: Checking this will create Lab Test(s) specified in the Sales Invoice on submission.
fields.label: Create Lab Test(s) on Sales Invoice Submission

fields.description: Checking this will create a Sample Collection document  every time you create a Lab Test
fields.label: Create Sample Collection document for Lab Test

fields.description: Manage Appointment Invoice submit and cancel automatically for Patient Encounter
fields.label: Automate Appointment Invoicing

fields.default:
Hello {{doc.patient}}, Thank you for registering with  {{doc.company}}. Your ID is {{doc.name}} . Please note this ID for future reference. 
Thank You!
fields.label: Registration Message

fields.default:
Hello {{doc.patient}}, You have scheduled an appointment with {{doc.practitioner}} on {{doc.appointment_datetime}} at  {{doc.company}}.
Thank you, Good day!
fields.label: Confirmation Message

fields.description: Do not confirm if appointment is created for the same day
fields.label: Avoid Confirmation

fields.default:
Hello {{doc.patient}}, You have an appointment with {{doc.practitioner}} by {{doc.appointment_datetime}} at  {{doc.company}}.
Thank you, Good day!
fields.label: Reminder Message

fields.description: The number of free follow ups (Patient Encounters in valid days) allowed
fields.label: Number of Patient Encounters in Valid Days
Allow Discharge Despite Unbilled Healthcare Services
Do Not Bill Patient Encounters for Inpatients
